channel.title: [PI] Friends cannot connect to my server [Hamachi]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I kinda have my server like i wanted for the biggest part so I decided to put the server online for my friends only (not actually public for everyone) So I made a hamachi network, he connected to it, he downloaded the exact same client as I use right now, he changed the client.java IP to my hamachi IP and compiled succesfully (he has the same java jdk as I have so the path is the same) but he still gets " error connecting to server " when trying to join my server. In hamachi it says "Direct tunnel" so thats good.
I really hope I don't have to portforward.. Are there any files besides client.java that needs to be changed to my hamachi IP? We really want this to work, that would be awesome.

item.title: [PI] Friends cannot connect to my server [Hamachi]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[Delta]How to connect to no-ip ip?

Give your client to your friends and they try. I always log on localhost/127.0.0.1 and they use my no-ip

Change the no-ip part to hamachi.

Read full topic
